Malaria prevention: 
intermittent 
preventive 
treatment in 
pregnancy (IPT p)
C.6: In malaria-endemic areas in Africa, intermittent preventive 
treatment with sulfadoxine-pyrimethamine (IPT p-SP) is recommended 
for all pregnant women. Dosing should start in the second trimester, and
